ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only certain roles can be recorded in a household.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = "IndustriesHousehold" && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Account.Type, "Mortgage only" )) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Account.Type, "Trust" )) && NOT(INCLUDES(Roles, "Client") || INCLUDES(Roles, "Child") || INCLUDES(Roles, "Other Important Family Member") || INCLUDES(Roles, "Deceased Client") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The role in a household must be client, child, other important family member, trust, or deceased client.
